plot: A small child travels to see his friends only to find he is being watched by hungry child eating trees, scared to death he lives trapped in his house for 15 years taking condolence in his only friend, and teddy bear, Mr. Rufflefluff.
title: Tea Mr Rufflefluff
plot_es: A small child travels to see his friends only to find he is being watched by hungry child eating trees, scared to death he lives trapped in his house for 15 years taking condolence in his only friend, and teddy bear, Mr. Rufflefluff.
